info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 2:32AM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely be slick and hazardous, including during this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will steadily fall to the single digits and low teens through this morning.
info.instruction: Carry a winter safety kit in your vehicle.
